title: EventX — Perfis por função e atalho de avisos na Home

requirements.summary: Estender o modal de configuração de perfil para suportar o papel Expositor/Artista e coletar campos específicos por função (CNPJ/CPF, Empresa, Portfólio/URL), com textos via i18n pt-BR.
acceptanceCriteria: Profile setup modal includes role selection for Organizador, Expositor/Artista, and Participante.
When Organizador is selected, inputs for CNPJ/CPF and Empresa are shown and persisted to the backend profile.
When Expositor/Artista is selected, an input for Portfolio/Social Media link is shown and persisted to the backend profile.
All labels/placeholders/buttons introduced or changed use pt-BR strings sourced from the i18n strings file (no hard-coded English UI text).

file_operations.description: Add role option for Expositor/Artista (mapped to the existing role value used by the app), and conditionally render organizer/exhibitor fields (cnpjCpf, empresa, portfolioUrl). Ensure the submit payload includes these optional fields when applicable, and replace any hard-coded placeholders with i18n strings via useStrings. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add pt-BR string keys for the new profile field labels and placeholders (CNPJ/CPF, Empresa, Portfólio/Redes sociais URL) and for existing hard-coded placeholders (nome/e-mail) used in the profile modal. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Adicionar na Home um botão de avisos em formato de sino com indicador de avisos recentes e ação para levar o usuário à lista de avisos.
acceptanceCriteria: Home screen shows a clearly visible notifications/bell UI control above-the-fold.
If announcements exist, the control visually indicates there are announcements (e.g., badge/count or highlighted state) using the existing announcements query data.
Activating the control takes the user to view announcements (either scroll/jump to the announcements card on Home or navigate to a dedicated announcements view if one exists).
All UI text related to this control remains in pt-BR (strings-based).

file_operations.description: Add a prominent notification bell control in the header area (above-the-fold) that uses existing announcements query data to show a badge/count/highlight when announcements exist. Wire click behavior to jump/scroll to the announcements section on the same page (e.g., via a stable section id/ref). Ensure any visible/accessible text (labels, aria-label, helper text) comes from pt-BR i18n strings. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add pt-BR string keys for the Home notifications control (e.g., 'Avisos', 'Ver avisos', accessible label for the bell, and any helper text). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Renomear o rótulo da aba inferior de “Programação” para “Eventos” via i18n, mantendo as rotas e o comportamento existentes.
acceptanceCriteria: Bottom tab bar displays “Eventos” instead of “Programação”.
The label is provided via the existing i18n strings module (no hard-coded label).
Navigation continues to function (the tab still routes correctly to the existing schedule/events page).

file_operations.description: Update the navigation label string currently used for the '/programacao' tab from “Programação” to “Eventos” (pt-BR), keeping the key-based i18n usage intact. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure the bottom tab bar uses the i18n-provided label that now renders as “Eventos” for the existing '/programacao' route, without changing navigation behavior. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Align the page header title with the updated i18n navigation label (so it reflects “Eventos” where appropriate), without changing the underlying '/programacao' route behavior. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
